settings.testimonial_content: Long-time user of ED Medication. Now I just use Eddie. Without being too explicit, the finales are so much more like the old days from 20+ years ago.
settings.testimonial_heading: Can't Believe It Works So Well

settings.testimonial_content:
I've had ED for 17 years and could not believe the difference that your product has made in my sex life. My confidence level is through the roof. 
															Amazing product and I am well satisfied.

Eddie is incredible. I used to take the popular ED meds but half the time I would get too sick to have sex. 
															My wife and I were blown away by Eddie. We LOVE it.
I've tried cock rings before and I was skeptical that Eddie would be a better alternative. To my delight, it was great, and without the too-restrictive feel I got from rings.
My husband decided to give Eddie a try. Wow! It's been so long since we've been intimate and it's changed our lives. We have one by the bed and one in a bag for when we travel.
Orgasms with Eddie feel better than cock ring. My wife barely noticed it was on. She actually loves it. I'm very satisfied with this purchase.
Eddie worked like a charm. My boyfriend and I are both super-excited about how well it works. No more awkward and disappointing endings for us!
Easy to clean and maintain. Low profile, too, so it doesn't get in the way. Best part is the excitement Eddie creates during our foreplay. Totally satisfied.
I got an Eddie for me and my husband. I thought it would get in the way, but I honestly don't give any thought to it anymore. I'm just happy we're being intimate again.

settings.text: Eddie is a wearable FDA Class II medical device engineered to treat ED. Improve your performance without the side effects of ED pills or uncomfortable treatments. Eddie works by harnessing your blood flow and enhancing your natural physiology to get you harder and make you last longer.
Eddie by Giddy: A Natural ED Treatment

settings.size_guide_description: Eddie is available in four sizes (A, B, C, D) based on girth or circumference, which fit 99% of men. If you decide you need a different size, we’ll ship a replacement free of charge.
